thread.section_title: Ondeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ondeck | ondeck.com.au
thread.title: Dirk Neugebauer

author: Dirk Neugebauer
title: Dirk Neugebauer
text:
Over the Past 2 years our company has been growing in a region of economic down turn and when funds were needed to allow for this growth OnDeck was there to help they were professional, understanding, and easy to deal with they spoke to us one on one and took the time to understand the challenges we were facing they worked out a solution and with in 24 hours we had funds made available to us. Since then OnDeck has continued to support us during our relocation and other challenges.
I would Highly recommend OnDeck to help your business grow way before any of the major Companies or Banks in the Market Place
